turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello can you place a pickup order for coffee for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly, where would you like this order place? At pete on lake street or stabucks on hennepin ave?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it placed at starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, what would you like me to order at starbucks

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: im thinking cold coffee caramel

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay which size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: grande

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: milk type for your grande?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: almond

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: almond it is, would you like any additional flavor?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ye can u add passion fruit

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like sugar added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes can you add double sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay double the sugar it is. would you like desert to go along with your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes add a crossant also can you add whipp cream to the coffe?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: whip cream and crossiant is added. anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can you actually order 2 of the coffee discussed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes I will surely add that. will this complete the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have a order pickup for Adam, at starbucks on hennepin Ave, 2 grande caramel coffee with double sugar, added passion fruit, and whipped cream, and a crossiant. does that sound correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes perfect

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: order has been place the total is 10.99.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you.
